Text: It changes the build from 6245 to 6246. Not sure if this is the steam update or not.
WTF... this update changed the iniative of runic mages to 2... and it doesnt fix the ice dragon bug not gettinga minion charge after scoring a kill :/ back to the old bugged  version.

i was mistaken, the ice dragon bug was fixed, it was bugged on the quicksave, a normal load of a savegame made it available, the rune mages tho had their initiative lowered to 2 :/
 who knows what else changed?
The rune mages are pretty powerful. If they go first with their phantom spell they would finish almost every combat before even starting it.
